item.title: Campaign delays push to expand Medicaid in Florida until 2028, citing new state law
item.description: A campaign to expand Medicaid in Florida is delaying its push to get the issue on the ballot until 2028

item.title: Alabama to execute man for 1997 shooting death of store clerk
item.description: Alabama is preparing to execute a man convicted of killing a woman during a 1997 gas station robbery
